head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HOARE, ROSE E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HOARE, ROSE E.

block.p: HOARE-Rose E. On September 3, 2000. Formerly of Aighe, Ardara Donegal, Ireland. Beloved wife of the late John T. Loving mother of John and Fr. Richard Hoare and Kathleen Morrongello. Dear mother-in-law of Lois and James. Cherished grandmother of John, Keriann, Daniela & Kelly. Devoted great grandmother of Layla. Friends may call Wednesday and Thursday 2-5 & 7-9:30 PM at the Thomas F. Dalton Funeral Home, Inc., 29 Atlantic Avenue, Floral Park, N.Y. (at R.R. Plaza). Mass of Christian burial Friday 10:30 AM at Our Lady of Victory RC Church. Interment St. Charles Cemetery.
